did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: 29 masonite panels of photographs used in an exhibit of Domʹinguez' achievements in architecture, April 1962, at the Andrew Dickson White Museum of Art, Cornell University.

bioghist.head: BIOGRAPHICAL NOTE
bioghist.p: Martʹin Domʹinguez was a visiting Professor of Architecture at Cornell University, 1960-1962.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: 29 masonite panels of photographs used in an exhibit of Domʹinguez' achievements in architecture, April 1962, at the Andrew Dickson White Museum of Art, Cornell University.

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: Martʹin Domʹinguez architectural photographs, #15-2-1676. Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library.

did.unittitle: Collection consists of a single box. Online guide unavailable.
